global_cities_query.template: select id, city_name, country, pop_ghs, area, pop_den from geodata.global_glx_open_citiesoftheworld WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

global_airports_query.template: select id, full_name, main_city, country, iata, icao, rank_group, rank from geodata.global_glx_geodata_transport_airport WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

aus_retail_diy_query.template: select id, retailer, fascia, store_name, town from geodata.vw_aus_glx_geodata_retail_locations_diy WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

aus_retail_grocery_query.template: select id, retailer, fascia, store_name, town from geodata.vw_aus_glx_geodata_retail_locations_grocery WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

aus_retail_department_stores_query.template: select id, retailer, fascia, store_name, town from geodata.vw_aus_glx_geodata_retail_locations_deptstore WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

aus_retail_dds_query.template: select id, retailer, fascia, store_name, town from geodata.vw_aus_glx_geodata_retail_locations_dds WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

uk_seamless_shopper_town population grow.template: SELECT pop_11, pop_15, pop_16, pop_17, pop_18, pop_19, pop_20, pop_21, pop_22, pop_23 FROM geodata.uk_glx_geodata_seamless_shopper_town_metrics WHERE id = ${id};

uk_seamless_shopper_town table.template: SELECT id, shop_town, pop_19, 100*pop_11_19 as pop_11_19, grocers_big4, grocers_discount, grocers_premium FROM geodata.uk_glx_geodata_seamless_shopper_town_metrics WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

uk_output_area age.template: SELECT age0to18, age18to24, age25to44, age45to59, age60plus FROM geodata.uk_glx_geodata_oa_metrics WHERE id = ${id};

uk_output_area ownership.template: SELECT dwelling_ownhome, dwelling_socialrented, dwelling_privaterented, dwelling_rentfree FROM geodata.uk_glx_geodata_oa_metrics WHERE id = ${id};

uk_output_area growth.template: SELECT pop_15, pop_16, pop_17, pop_18, pop_19, pop_20, pop_21, pop_22, pop_23, pop_24 FROM geodata.uk_glx_geodata_oa_metrics WHERE id = ${id};

uk_output_area property.template: SELECT housetype_houses, housetype_flats, housetype_other, age45to59, age60plus FROM geodata.uk_glx_geodata_oa_metrics WHERE id = ${id};

uk_workers_occupation_split.template: SELECT agriculture, mining, manufacturing, electricity, water, construction, wholesale, transport, accommodation, it, finance, real_estate, professional, administrative, public_admin, education, human_health, arts, other, households, extraterritorial FROM geodata.uk_glx_geodata_workers_hybrid_zone WHERE id = ${id};

uk_polygon_worker.template: select sum(workers) from mapp.uk_polygons, geodata.uk_glx_geodata_workers_hybrid_zone where st_intersects(mapp.uk_polygons.geom_3857, geodata.uk_glx_geodata_workers_hybrid_zone.geom_3857) and mapp.uk_polygons.id = ${id}

uk_polygon_workerkm2.template: select round(avg(workerskm2),2) from mapp.uk_polygons, geodata.uk_glx_geodata_workers_hybrid_zone where st_intersects(mapp.uk_polygons.geom_3857, geodata.uk_glx_geodata_workers_hybrid_zone.geom_3857) and mapp.uk_polygons.id = ${id}

uk_retail_places table.template: select id, rp_name, rp_type, comp_strgh, est_brands from geodata.uk_glx_geodata_retail_place WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

uk_retail_places profile.template: SELECT comp_pct, conv_pct, fbl_pct, serv_pct, classbrass FROM geodata.uk_glx_geodata_retail_place WHERE id = ${id};

uk_pizza table.template: SELECT takeaway_id as id, restaurant_name, fascia, competitor_category, price FROM geodata.glx_pizza_places WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

uk_grocery table.template: SELECT id as id, store_name, retailer, fascia, size_sqft FROM geodata.uk_glx_open_retail_points WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

eu_cities table.template: SELECT id, city_name, country, pop_ghs, area, pop_den FROM mapp.vw_eu_glx_open_citiesofeurope WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

eu_fashion table.template: SELECT id, retailer, fascia, store_name, town FROM mapp.vw_eu_glx_geodata_retail_locations_fashion WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

eu_sport table.template: SELECT id, retailer, fascia, store_name, town FROM mapp.vw_eu_glx_geodata_retail_locations_sport WHERE true ${viewport} ${filter} limit 99;

labels: Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply
Water supply; Sewerage, waste management and remediation activities
Wholesale and retail trade; Repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles
Public administration and defence; Compulsory social security
Human health and social work activities
